original_definition: 'projections without measures' means projections of anthropogenic greenhouse gas emissions by sources and removals by sinks that exclude the effects of all policies and measures which are planned, adopted or implemented after the year chosen as the starting point for the relevant projection;
generated_definition: 'projections without measures' means projections without measures are estimates or predictions of future events or trends without accompanying data or metrics, while projections with measures provide such data or metrics to support the projections.

Article 2: ‘projections without measures’ means projections of anthropogenic greenhouse gas emissions by sources and removals by sinks that exclude the effects of allpolicies and measures which are planned, adopted or implemented after the year chosen as the starting point for the relevant projection;
